newsitem.title: JAPAN: Tokio Marine shares up in the morning.
newsitem.headline: Tokio Marine shares up in the morning.

text.p: Tokio Marine & Fire Insurance Co Ltd rose on Thursday morning as investors were attracted to what has been a laggard among blue-chip shares, traders said.
At 0109 GMT, the major casualty insurance firm was up 30 yen at 1,400. Its turnover of 3.299 million shares was the heaviest on the first section of the Tokyo Stock Exchange.

"Investors were taking profits in blue-chip shares that had led a rally and buying laggards that have high liquidity. Tokio Marine was bought on the trend," said a broker at a "Big Four" securities house.
